answers.answer: with my first, i KNEW i wasn't going to make it to the end. In fact, i knew in my gut i wasn't going to make it to my shower. I was right. I didn't go into labor, but had to have an emergency c-section due to severe preeclampsia at 36 weeks.Unfortunately, I am having a similar feeling with this pregnancy. I am hoping it's just paranoia influencing my gut feeling, but i don't know...
I have had this weird feeling this whole time that I will go at 34 weeks. Not sure why, it's just been this weird feeling I have had all along. I'm hoping its just impatients/ paranoia.

yeah, it's just a weird little feeling and it's really important for me to be totally ready in three weeks time. in fact, to be honest, i'm not happy that i'm not ready now. maybe it'll be impatience or maybe it is a mum's instinct, guess all we can do is wait and see.
I also have the strong feeling that I am going to go early... I don't think I am going to make it to August. With as strong as the baby is and as big as I am. I think we will be mid to end July.

Me too!! I feel kinda bad for wishing it, but I hope he comes around 36-37 weeks.  I am huge already and No One can believe it when I tell them I'm due August 2.  I will be VERY surprised if I make it that long.I am planning to be ready just in case.  My DS has a birthday in June, then DD's is July 10, so anytime after that would be good. = )

Yup!  I am not that huge, but with all the braxton hicks and weird pains I am convinced I am going to go early.  I am thankful everyday now that I stay pregnant.  My dr. says everything is perfect, so maybe I am just paraniod since this is my first.  My mom went 2 weeks early with me and my brother.  I just want him to stay in long enough so that he is healthy and we can take him home right away!

I have had 4 boys and all the boys have been 5-7 days late, My girls have been a week or so early and this one is a boy but I am hoping early I want to have him on the 1st of Aug instead of the end that's not too much to ask for is it.
well, i had an internal this morning and my cervix is high ( at 29+ weeks). i think this suggests a timely birth rather than a prem...but i'm not sure. does anyone else know?
I can only hope I go early!! Not too early but 37 weeks would be fine by me:=)
well, i've pretty much lost my plug at 31 1/2 weeks so maybe my instincts were right and i'm gonna go early! that'll be a first.
My twins are officially due August 25th, but I think they will come the first week of August.  As long as they come after 36+0, then I am fine with whenever.
i'd love for labour to come after 36 weeks for me too...i just don't see it. i feel like i'm tryin to keep him in there already

I thought that I was gonna have to go to the hospital last night.  From 11pm until 3:30am I was having painful contractions for every 7 minutes on the dot. They lasted about 26 seconds a piece. I got worried but decided just to wait it out and see if they got any worse. They were not getting any better but they did not get any worse either. They finally went away and I was so tired. WOOOO close call.
i had a similar thing happen. my midwife said it was my body trying to get the head engaged...were the contractions low? if so, that's probably what it was.

Yes they were low...I was glad when they finally stopped. I was very tired. I had no idea as to why it was happening. I didn't want to call the dr since they stopped after about 3 1/2 hours. Thank you for letting me know that.

I too have this funny feeling i am going to go early or maybe it's just wishful thinking. My son was 4 days overdue and i was induced with him and then my daughter came on her due date. But with all these early aches and pains i'm getting with this one i'm sure s/he is going to come early. I'm 30 weeks today so in another 6 weeks it'll be nice to see the little one he he. I go for my midwife appointment and then i have to go for a scan sometime between now and the 8th July as i have to see a specialist on the 8th July as they are keeping a close eye on the ladies that had previoulsly had smaller babies. So i'm really looking forward to all these appointments and i suppose they'll give me a good idea if s/he is going to make an early entrance.Good luck to everyone, not long now!!!!!

well, pookie, you were right with your instincts! congratulations on your beautiful twin girls. i'm FREAKING myself out tonight...double checking hospital bags and have an amazing urge to make sure everything in my home is clean, even though i'm really tired.

question: i really don't know why since i've had 3 boys who were ALL as overdue as they could be and i'm having another boy...but i get the feeling i'm gonna go in labour early. my instincts are to have everything ready in 3 weeks...is/has anyone else gone through this?
title: anyone feel like they're gonna go early?
